name: Pluie D'Acier
description:
Velnaria is a peaceful, paradise-like planet. It is suddenly invaded by beings made of iron and metal. Play as Bernard, a Velnarian warrior, who must defend his planet against the invaders.

Control:

Z: forward
Q: Left
S: Back
D: Right

Team:

-Yvan Bladet: Game Designer, Programmer

-Mathieu Belzo: DA, 3D artist, 3D animator

-Romain Poli (Bernard Croustille): scenarist, 3D artist, 3D animator

-David Bichon: concept artist

-Sidney Deschamps: 3D artiste, texturing 

-Anaïs Lafond: 2D artiste, technical artist
